001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import com.google.common.io.ByteStreams;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.ParserException;
005
006import javax.mail.Message;
007import java.io.File;
008import java.io.FileOutputStream;
009import java.io.IOException;
010import java.io.InputStream;
011import java.util.Collections;
012
013public class SurveySubmissionsProcessor extends StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor {
014  public SurveySubmissionsProcessor(File directory, GradeBook gradeBook) {
015    super(directory, gradeBook);
016  }
017
018  @Override
019  public Iterable<? extends String> getSupportedContentTypes() {
020    return Collections.singleton("text/xml");
021  }
022
023  @Override
024  public String getEmailFolder() {
025    return "Student Surveys";
026  }
027
028  @Override
029  public void processAttachment(Message message, String fileName, InputStream inputStream, String contentType) {
030    debug("    File name: " + fileName);
031    debug("    InputStream: " + inputStream);
032
033    File file = new File(directory, fileName);
034    try {
035
036      if (file.exists()) {
037        warnOfPreExistingFile(file);
038        return;
039      }
040
041      ByteStreams.copy(inputStream, new FileOutputStream(file));
042    } catch (IOException ex) {
043      logException("While writing \"" + fileName + "\" to \"" + directory + "\"", ex);
044    }
045
046    addStudentFromFileToGradeBook(file, gradeBook);
047  }
048
049  private void addStudentFromFileToGradeBook(File file, GradeBook gradeBook) {
050    Student student;
051
052    try {
053      XmlStudentParser parser = new XmlStudentParser(file);
054      student = parser.parseStudent();
055
056    } catch (IOException | ParserException ex) {
057      logException("While parsing \"" + file + "\"", ex);
058      return;
059    }
060
061    if (gradeBook.containsStudent(student.getId())) {
062      warn("Student \"" + student.getId() + "\" already exists in " + gradeBook.getClassName());
063      return;
064    }
065
066    gradeBook.addStudent(student);
067
068    info("Added " + student.getFullName() + " to " + gradeBook.getClassName());
069
070    logNotesAboutStudent(student);
071  }
072
073  private void logNotesAboutStudent(Student student) {
074    student.getNotes().forEach((note) -> info("  " + note));
075  }
076
077  private void warnOfPreExistingFile(File file) {
078    warn("Not processing existing file \"" + file + "\"");
079  }
080
081}
